ISSUE.TITLE: Notification Templates UI doesn't always show custom messages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ```shell $ awx notification_templates get 4 -f human --filter name,messages name messages =========== ==================================================== Testing 123 {"success": {"message": "It worked!", "body": null}} ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: rename the CyberArk AIM credential type see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/4400

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix a minor bug in the notification templates UI see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/5029
fix a minor bug in the notification templates UI see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/5029
